Package main.java

Interface Accountable

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<Accountable>
public interface Accountable extends Comparable<Accountable>
Interface for Accountables, (e.g., bank accounts).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    compareTo(Accountable other)
    Compares this account to the other account to determine if this account is smaller than, equal to, or larger than the other account.
    int
    getBalance()
    Returns the current balance of the account.
    int
    updateBalance(int amount)
    Adds to the current account balance, and returns the new account balance.

  • Method Details

    • getBalance

      int getBalance()
      Returns the current balance of the account.
      Returns:
      the account balance

    • updateBalance

      int updateBalance(int amount)
      Adds to the current account balance, and returns the new account balance.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to deposit/withdraw
      Returns:
      the new balance of the account

    • compareTo

      int compareTo(Accountable other)
      Compares this account to the other account to determine if this account is smaller than, equal to, or larger than the other account.

      Required to implement the Comparable interface.

      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Accountable>
      Parameters:
      other - the account to compare
      Returns:
      a positive value (> 0) if this account has a larger balance, 0 if this account has an equivalent balance, or a negative value (< 0) if this account has a smaller balance.
